testCase.name: protobuf primitives

topics.name: input

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, i INTEGER, l BIGINT, d DOUBLE, b BOOLEAN, s STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='PROTOBUF');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT * FROM input;
